description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.
name: theclique.top_headlines

description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.
name: theclique.top_headlines

improvement: The existing tool description was a good starting point, but it could be made more compelling and user-friendly.
description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country or specific category within that country. You can also search with keywords to get the latest news articles in your desired language. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

Use this endpoint to retrieve headlines for news tickers, apps, or any other application that requires real-time news updates.
name: real_time_news_data.topic_headlines

improvement: A closer examination of the provided tool's functionality shows that it provides top-level headlines for multiple countries using keywords. However, refining this to better suit user requests is necessary.
description:
Get the latest news headlines from around the world or a specific country, with optional keyword search. News articles are sorted by earliest publication date.

Ideal for retrieving real-time updates for news tickers, apps, or applications requiring timely news feeds.
name: global_top_news

improvement: Given the provided feedback indicates that refinement to better suit user requests may result from a closer examination of the tool's functionality, I believe the focus should be on optimizing the current function and name while taking into account the various options available.
description:
Get country-specific top news headlines. Enter a country code, followed by optional keyword search parameters.

Use this endpoint to retrieve real-time news updates for news applications or devices requiring timely news feeds.
name: global_top_news

improvement: The provided tool description and name might be too similar to one of the other available tools, so a change in wording could lead to higher adoption rate.
description:
Get country-specific top news headlines. Enter a 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code, followed by optional keyword search parameters.

Use this endpoint to retrieve real-time news updates for news applications or devices requiring timely news feeds with country filtering.
name: country_top_news

improvement: The tool currently gets 49.0% selection rate, which is better than another closely related tool (country_top_news) but can be improved by refining the name and description.
description:
Get country-specific top news headlines in seconds. Enter a country code followed by optional keyword search parameters.

Retrieve up-to-the-minute updates for your news feed or application., "true" if retrieved in this endpoint, "false" otherwise
name: country_topic_news

improvement: The current tool, country_topic_news, is often selected due to its simplicity and focus on top news headlines by country. However, it may not be the most efficient choice for users seeking specific categories or languages.
description:
Get the latest news headlines from around the world, by category, or language.

Optionally specify a 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code, followed by optional keyword search parameters and a category filter. Articles are sorted by earliest publication date.

Use this endpoint to retrieve real-time updates for news tickers, apps, or applications requiring timely news feeds.
name: country_news_selector

improvement: Based on the agent's usage patterns, it seems that the top-performing tool was country_news_selector. However, its name didn't convey a clear advantage to users compared to other tools like real_time_news_data.topic_headlines. I will refine the name and description to better reflect the benefits of this endpoint.
description:
Get the latest news headlines from around the world, by category, or language. Optionally specify a 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code, followed by optional keyword search parameters in English, and a category filter. Articles are sorted by earliest publication date.

Use this endpoint to retrieve real-time updates for news tickers, apps, or applications requiring timely news feeds with country filtering.
name: country_global_news

description:
Get the latest news headlines from around the world, by category, or language. Optionally specify a 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code, followed by optional keyword search parameters in English, and a category filter. Articles are sorted by earliest publication date.

Use this endpoint to retrieve real-time updates for news tickers, apps, or applications requiring timely news feeds with country filtering.
name: country_global_news
